revision.text: Possibly: New idylles by Gessner. Translated by W. Hooper MD. With A Letter to M. Fuslin, on landscape painting, and the two friends of Bourbon, a moral tale, by M. Diderot. (Salomon Gessner). (London : Printed for S. Hooper Ludgate Hill & G. Robinson Paternoster Row, MDCCLXXVI. [1776]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2103306~S1
